articles.title: LadBaby and Martin Lewis rework Band Aid's Do They Know It's Christmas - BBC
articles.description: The duo will make their fifth assault on the charts with a cover of Do They Know It's Christmas.
articles.content:
YouTube stars LadBaby have unveiled plans to score an unprecedented fifth Christmas number one single in a row.
The duo, Mark and Roxanne Hoyle, will cover Band Aid's 1984 hit Do They Know It's Chri… [+3409 chars]
